hint: Apply aggressive predicate pushdown to dimension tables before joining, using CTEs or derived tables to isolate selective filters on date_dim, item, and demographics early in the execution plan.
Pre-filter all dimension tables (date, item, demographics) into materialized CTEs with explicit joins, then join with the fact tables (catalog_sales, inventory) using the filtered dimension keys.
Materialize pre-filtered subsets of BOTH dimension AND fact tables into separate CTEs before performing joins, and consider decomposing the date_dim self-join pattern for better optimization.

Transform the query structure by eliminating redundant scans through fact table decomposition, converting implicit correlations to explicit joins, and materializing intermediate result sets to break complex join dependencies.
